verses.text: \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* thirty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w forty-two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* news: “\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* \w outpost|strong="H5333"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H1571"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stench \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*!” \w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w summoned|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* join \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.

\w Seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* danger \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w hard-pressed|strong="H5065"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w caves|strong="H4631"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w thickets|strong="H2337"\w*, \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w cellars|strong="H6877"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* cisterns.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* he said, “\w Bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w me|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.” \w And|strong="H7586"\w* he \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

Just \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* arrived, \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w greet|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?” \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* replied, “\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* deserting \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* gathering \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*,

\w I|strong="H6258"\w* thought, ‘\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w descend|strong="H3381"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sought|strong="H2470"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’ \w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* felt compelled \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.”
